About Me

My Developer story..

Your Projects Is In Safe Hands

My name is Chigozie Francis.I have a National Higher Diploma in Computer Science.I speak English fluently and German fluently (" fließend "). After the last covid-2019 experience, I have witnessed how helpful the Internet was to people during the lock-downs. I have taken some University-courses about Web Interface Design and I have received professional training (Coding Boot Camp) to becoming a Web and App.

The Thema digitalization is my watch word. As the impacts of covid-2019 is incresing disrupting every normal way of living, I am constantly developping digital platforms with the aim of reaching everyone.
